scripts.upgrade-dep: bun add @astrojs/alpinejs @astrojs/compiler @astrojs/sitemap @astrojs/tailwind @tailwindcss/nesting @tailwindcss/typography @types/alpinejs alpinejs astro astro-compressor autoprefixer cssnano micromark micromark-extension-directive motus postcss-import sharp tailwindcss
scripts.upgrade-dev: bun add -d @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser eslint eslint-config-airbnb-base eslint-import-resolver-typescript eslint-plugin-astro eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-json eslint-plugin-vue micromark-util-types typescript
scripts.upgrade-all: bun run upgrade-dep && bun run upgrade-dev
